titleStmt.title: England's way wealth and honour in a dialogue between and English-man and a Dutch-man.
titleStmt.author: Puckle, James, 1667?-1724.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Sam. Crouch at the corner of Popes-Head-Alley, over-against the Royal Exchange in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Also published under titles: "England's interests ..", "A new dialogue between a burgermaster and an English gentleman ..", "England's path to wealth and honour ..", "The advantages of the fishery to Great Britain demonstrated.".
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.

place.placeName: the corner of Popes-Head-Alley, over-against the Royal Exchange in Cornhill
